nodes.text:
A public bathhouse was located in a steel-gray building in Pinyumb, a city on Sullust, and operated during the Galactic Civil War. In 3 ABY, the stormtrooper Thara Nyende walked by the building on her way to her uncle's
cantina.

During the Imperial lockdown of Pinyumb that same year, victims of the Imperial raids were taken to a bright blue pool in the public bathhouse. Two members of the Rebel Alliance, Nien Nunb and Hazram Namir, arrived to help the injured, but a man attempted to reject the rebels, blaming them for the Imperial curfew. After a back and forth with the man, Namir resumed tending to injured residents and departed with Nunb.
The public bathhouse appeared in the 2015 novel Battlefront: Twilight Company, written by Alexander Freed.
